foods.name: Circadian Rhythm Optimization
properties: Same food has different effects at different times
Integrates sleep, eating, and activity timing
foods.benefits: Circadian rhythm optimization is a cornerstone of the How Not to Diet approach. The science of chronobiology reveals that when we eat matters as much as what we eat - the same number of calories eaten at different times of day, after different amounts of sleep, or in different meal distributions can translate into different amounts of body fat. Optimizing circadian rhythms involves: eating earlier (front-loaded calories), fasting after 7 PM, getting sufficient sleep at regular times, avoiding caffeine near bedtime, and time-restricting eating windows. These strategies leverage the body's natural metabolic rhythms for enhanced weight loss.
foods.amount: Comprehensive timing strategy integrating multiple tweaks

quotes: The same number of calories eaten at a different time of the day, in a different meal distribution or after different amounts of sleep can translate into different amounts of body fat.
Because of our circadian rhythm, food eaten at night is more fattening than the exact same food eaten earlier in the day
Given the circadian benefits of reducing evening food intake, the window should end before 7:00 p.m.
Finally, there are options that show theoretical promise but haven't been sufficiently vetted in clinical trials, such as pistachios for circadian synchronization

foods.name: Evening Fasting (After 7:00 PM)
properties: Part of 21 Tweaks - EVERY NIGHT category
Fast for minimum 12 hours starting before 7:00 PM
Leverages circadian rhythm for fat loss
foods.benefits: Fasting after 7:00 PM is a critical circadian-based weight-loss strategy. Because of our circadian rhythm, food eaten at night is more fattening than the exact same food eaten earlier in the day. By fasting every night for at least 12 hours starting before 7:00 PM, you align eating with optimal metabolic windows. The fewer calories consumed after sundown, the better for weight loss. This practice supports natural overnight fat burning and metabolic repair processes.

foods.benefits: Goji berries are recommended as a weight-loss-optimized alternative to raisins. They activate AMPK, which helps boost cellular metabolism and fat burning. Their anti-inflammatory properties and nutrient density make them an excellent breakfast addition.
foods.amount: Use as dried fruit alternative in breakfast dishes

quotes: If we did want to use dried, as we learned in the Amping AMPK and Inflammation Quenchers sections, barberries or gojis might be a better choice.

foods.name: Green Beans
properties: Part of Daily Dozen - vegetables and beans categories
Rich in vitamins K, C, and folate
foods.benefits: Green beans contain approximately 90% water, making them one of the most water-rich vegetables for weight loss. Lightly steamed green beans retain their crisp texture, providing orosensory stimulation that may slow eating rate. As an aboveground vegetable high on the water scale, green beans are ideal for optimizing weight loss meals.
foods.amount: 1½ cups/165g green beans, cut into 1½-inch/4cm pieces and lightly steamed

quotes: 1½ cups/165g green beans, cut into 1½-inch/4cm pieces and lightly steamed
8 ounces/225g green beans, trimmed and cut into 1½-inch/4cm pieces
Add the green beans and carrots and steam until just tender, about 3 minutes.

foods.name: Green Papaya
properties: Low glycemic compared to ripe papaya
foods.benefits: Green papaya is a water-rich vegetable (when unripe) with approximately 88-90% water content. Featured in Thai cuisine, it provides volume and hydration while being very low in calories. The digestive enzymes in green papaya may aid in nutrient absorption and digestion.
foods.amount: 1 large green papaya per salad serving (serves 4)

quotes: THAI GREEN PAPAYA SALAD
1 large green papaya, peeled, de-seeded and grated
If you can't get hold of green papaya, you could try cucumber and/or shredded cabbage.

foods.name: Green Tea
properties: Part of 21 Tweaks for weight loss
foods.benefits: Green tea has been shown to boost metabolism and enhance fat burning. The catechins in green tea, particularly EGCG, support weight loss efforts. Regular consumption throughout the day maximizes metabolic benefits.
foods.amount: 3 cups daily

quotes: GREEN TEA (3 cups) - Tea bags can be used if desired, but to maximize the polyphenol content, use caffeinated loose-leaf green tea and steep at 80°C for 3 minutes.

foods.name: Greens (Low-Oxalate)
properties: Part of Daily Dozen - 2 servings daily
Should be eaten earlier in the meal
foods.benefits: Fat-blocking thylakoids and calcium support weight loss. Vegetables represent the healthiest class of foods with the fewest calories. Boost absorption of fat-soluble nutrients when paired with nuts.
foods.amount: 2 servings daily

quotes: Fat-blocking thylakoids and calcium are covered with my recommendation to eat lots of low-oxalate greens.
Since vegetables represent the healthiest class of foods with the fewest calories, we should aim to eat them earlier in the meal.

foods.name: Hibiscus-Lemon Verbena Blend (6:1)
foods.benefits: The hibiscus-lemon verbena blend (6 parts hibiscus to 1 part lemon verbena) is an ideal evening beverage choice because it's caffeine-free and won't disrupt sleep. Unlike green tea and chai tea, which must be avoided within 6 hours of bedtime, this herbal blend can be enjoyed at dinner or in the evening. The calming properties of lemon verbena combined with the antioxidant-rich hibiscus provide metabolic benefits without sleep interference. This makes it perfect for supporting both circadian rhythm optimization and adequate hydration in the evening hours.
foods.amount: Mix 6 parts hibiscus tea with 1 part lemon verbena; consume as desired

quotes: During meals, drink water, black coffee or hibiscus tea mixed 6:1 with lemon verbena, but never exceed 3 cups of fluid per hour.

foods.name: Hibiscus Tea
properties: Can be mixed with lemon verbena
foods.benefits: Hibiscus tea is rich in anthocyanins and powerful antioxidants that support weight loss and cardiovascular health. Unlike some teas, it can be consumed during meals without interfering with nutrient absorption. When mixed 6:1 with lemon verbena, it creates a synergistic blend. Hibiscus has been shown to support healthy blood pressure and may help with fat metabolism.
foods.amount: Can be consumed during meals, mixed 6:1 with lemon verbena

quotes: During meals, drink water, black coffee or hibiscus tea mixed 6:1 with lemon verbena, but never exceed 3 cups of fluid per hour.

foods.name: Intact Whole Grains (Groats)
properties: Calories trapped within intact cell walls
Includes oat groats, wheat berries, rye berries
Part of 'Wall Off Your Calories' strategy
foods.benefits: Intact whole grains (groats) represent the 'wholiest of grains' with calories trapped within unbroken cell walls. This structural integrity slows digestion, lowers glycemic impact, activates the ileal brake for appetite suppression, and delivers resistant starch to beneficial gut bacteria. Former Harvard nutrition chair Walter Willett argues the term 'whole grain' should be reserved only for intact kernels. Examples include oat groats, wheat berries, rye berries, and other whole, uncut grain kernels.
foods.amount: Part of Daily Dozen whole grain servings - prioritize intact over flour

quotes: Eating whole grains is good, but eating whole-grain kernels is better. Former Harvard nutrition chair Walter Willett has argued that the term whole grain should probably be reserved for only whole, intact grain kernels. So, eat the wholiest of grains: intact grains, also known as groats.

DEFLOUR YOUR DIET: Check this box every day your whole-grain servings are in the form of intact grains. The powdering of even 100% whole grains robs our microbiome of the starch that would otherwise be ferried down to our colon enclosed in unbroken cell walls.

foods.name: Jalapeño Pepper
foods.benefits: Jalapeño peppers activate brown adipose tissue (BAT), which burns calories to generate heat. The capsaicin in jalapeños triggers thermogenesis, increasing metabolic rate and fat burning. BAT activation is a powerful weight-loss mechanism that turns white fat into metabolically active brown fat. Can be sliced thinly or chopped finely to reduce heat while maintaining benefits.
foods.amount: 1 raw jalapeño pepper daily

quotes: Alternately, for BAT activation, you can add one raw jalapeño pepper or ½ teaspoon of red pepper powder (or, presumably, crushed red pepper flakes) into your daily diet. To help beat the heat, you can very thinly slice or finely chop the jalapeño to reduce its bite to little prickles, or mix the red pepper into soup.

foods.name: Barberries
properties: Better choice than raisins for weight loss
foods.benefits: Barberries are highlighted as a superior choice to raisins for weight loss optimization. They have AMPK-activating properties that help boost metabolism. Their anti-inflammatory compounds support overall health while providing natural sweetness to breakfast dishes.
foods.amount: Use as dried fruit alternative in breakfast dishes

quotes: If we did want to use dried, as we learned in the Amping AMPK and Inflammation Quenchers sections, barberries or gojis might be a better choice.

foods.name: Jalapeño Peppers
properties: Can be used raw or cooked
foods.benefits: Jalapeño peppers activate brown adipose tissue (BAT) which increases calorie burning. One raw jalapeño pepper per day can help boost metabolism through thermogenic effects. The capsaicin content stimulates fat burning and increases energy expenditure.
foods.amount: 1 raw jalapeño pepper daily (or 1/2 tsp red pepper powder)

quotes: Alternately, for BAT activation, you can add one raw jalapeño pepper or ½ teaspoon of red pepper powder (or, presumably, crushed red pepper flakes) into your daily diet. To help beat the heat, you can very thinly slice or finely chop the jalapeño to reduce its bite to little prickles, or mix the red pepper into soup or the whole food vegetable smoothie featured in one of my cooking videos on NutritionFacts.org.

foods.name: Kale
properties: Part of Daily Dozen - 2 servings of greens daily
Blanching and steaming boost antioxidant content
Can be boiled without losing antioxidant punch
Steaming preferred over microwaving, stir-frying or boiling
foods.benefits: Increased antioxidant capacity of blood, significant reductions of total cholesterol, LDL cholesterol, blood sugar levels, and oxidized LDL. Helps reduce risk of heart disease and strokes. Blanching and steaming kale actually boost antioxidant content, whereas microwaving or boiling doesn't do much. You can boil kale without losing out on its antioxidant punch, making it versatile for various cooking methods.
foods.amount: Daily consumption recommended (part of 2 servings of greens). 4 cups/260g chopped kale per recipe (4 servings)

quotes: Study subjects ate kale and cabbage every day for two weeks and got increased antioxidant capacity of their blood and significant reductions of total cholesterol, LDL cholesterol, blood sugar levels, and oxidized LDL. (page 13)

HOW TO COOK GREENS - Although eating greens fresh is best, steaming's not bad, microwaving comes in second, and stir-frying and boiling fall to the bottom of the barrel. What about kale specifically? Blanching and steaming kale actually boost antioxidant content, whereas microwaving or even boiling doesn't seem to do much. So, you can boil kale without losing out on its antioxidant punch. (page 223)
4 cups/260g finely chopped kale - Peppers Stuffed with Black Beans and Mushroom-Walnut Crumbles (page 199)
1 cup/30g finely shredded kale or other dark leafy greens - Roasted Kabocha with Kale-Cranberry Stuffing (page 202)

foods.name: Lemon Verbena
foods.benefits: Lemon verbena is an aromatic herb traditionally used for digestive support and its calming properties. When mixed with hibiscus tea (1 part lemon verbena to 6 parts hibiscus), it creates a synergistic beverage blend that can be consumed during meals. The herb contains powerful antioxidants and anti-inflammatory compounds that support overall health and weight management.
foods.amount: Mix 1 part with 6 parts hibiscus tea

quotes: During meals, drink water, black coffee or hibiscus tea mixed 6:1 with lemon verbena.

foods.name: Lentils (Brown/Puy)

foods.name: Barley (Whole Grain)

quotes: Plant cells, on the other hand, have cell walls that are made out of fibre which acts as an indigestible physical barrier, so many of the calories remain trapped.

foods.name: Mung Beans

foods.name: Mustard Greens

foods.name: Negative Calorie Foods
properties: Part of 21 Tweaks for weight loss
foods.benefits: Preloading with negative calorie foods (raw vegetables or fruits) before meals significantly reduces overall caloric intake. The high water and fiber content increases satiety while providing minimal calories. Eating these first helps crowd out more calorie-dense foods.
foods.amount: Preload with raw vegetables or fruit before each meal

quotes: PRELOAD WITH 'NEGATIVE CALORIE' FOODS - Start each meal with an apple, light salad, or a soup (broth-based or puréed vegetables, but not a cream soup).

foods.name: Nigella Seeds (Black Cumin)
properties: Part of 21 Tweaks for weight loss
Also known as black cumin or black seed
foods.benefits: Systematic review and meta-analysis of randomized, controlled weight-loss trials found that about 1/4 teaspoon of nigella seed powder every day appears to reduce body mass index within a span of a couple of months.
foods.amount: 1/4 teaspoon daily

quotes: Nigella Seeds (Nigella sativa) (1/4 teaspoon) - As noted in the Appetite Suppression section of How Not to Diet, a systematic review and meta-analysis of randomized, controlled weight-loss trials found that about 1/4 teaspoon of nigella seed powder every day appears to reduce body mass index within a span of a couple of months.

foods.name: Nori (Seaweed)

foods.name: Nutritional Yeast
properties: Part of 21 Tweaks for weight loss
foods.benefits: Nutritional yeast provides appetite suppression benefits and is rich in B vitamins. The beta-glucan fiber content helps with satiety. It adds a savory, cheesy flavor to meals without added calories.

quotes: NUTRITIONAL YEAST (2 tsp) - Sprinkle on any savoury meal.

foods.name: Oat Groats (Whole Intact Oats)
properties: Part of Daily Dozen - 3 servings of whole grains daily
Better than steel-cut, rolled, or instant oats
foods.benefits: Provides fiber-encased calories which blunts glycemic impact, activates ileal brake that dials down appetite, and delivers sustenance to friendly gut flora. Better blood sugar control than processed oat forms.
foods.amount: Part of 3 daily servings of whole grains

quotes: Take oats, for example. They're found out in the fields as oat groats and then have their inedible outer husks removed during processing. Groats can then be sliced into two to four pieces to make steel-cut oats... Instead of buying boxed breakfast cereals, make oatmeal out of whole, intact oats. They're gr-r-oat!

foods.name: Pistachios
properties: Rich in healthy fats and protein
foods.benefits: Pistachios show theoretical promise for weight loss through circadian synchronization. They naturally contain melatonin and other compounds that may help regulate sleep-wake cycles and metabolism. Eating pistachios in-shell naturally slows consumption rate, increasing satiety. While promising, this mechanism hasn't been sufficiently tested in clinical trials yet. As with all nuts, they should be eaten raw and whole rather than processed into butters for optimal weight-loss benefits.

quotes: Finally, there are options that show theoretical promise but haven't been sufficiently vetted in clinical trials, such as pistachios for circadian synchronization or mixing peppermint oil into hand lotion to facilitate brown adipose tissue (BAT) activation.
